page.description: Displays the Move records dialog from inside a form or browse layout.
page.discussion: The A5_BATCH_MOVE() function displays the Move Records dialog box when a form or browse is open.

section.title: Example
section.description: Note : To make this example work from the Interactive window, you must first select Interactive > Select Interactive Window Session ... > Customer Information.
section.example: dim frm as P frm = form.view("Customer Information") a5_batch_move()
